about_the_game:
The 68-page Digital Artbook takes you behind the scenes of Rogue Lords. Explore the origins of the game, the amazing creations by our artists, and lots of exclusive designs and research for the Disciples, enemies and environments.

Chapter 1: The Devil
Chapter 2: The Disciples
Chapter 3: The New World
Chapter 4: The Factions
Chapter 5: Meet the Team

The Digital Artbook will appear directly in the Steam installation directory on your PC. To find it:
1. In your Steam library, right-click on Rogue Lords
2. Click ''Manage'' then ''Browse local files''
3. Open the folder ''Rogue_Lords_Digital_Artbook''

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains minimal blood, mild violence, mature and suggestive themes, alcohol reference, and infrequent use of strong language.

The 68-page Digital Artbook takes you behind the scenes of Rogue Lords. Explore the origins of the game, the amazing creations by our artists, and lots of exclusive designs and research for the Disciples, enemies and environments.

Chapter 1: The Devil
Chapter 2: The Disciples

The Digital Artbook will appear directly in the Steam installation directory on your PC. To find it:

name: Rogue Lords - Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 | AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1GB | AMD Radeon HD 7770, 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: The 80-page Digital Artbook takes you behind the scenes of Rogue Lords. Explore the origins of the game, the amazing creations by our artists, and lots of exclusive designs and research for the Disciples, enemies and environments.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support
